summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Criminal Code; amending Sections 12A.06.040 Harassment, 12A.06.120 Domestic violence defined, 12A.06.130 No contact orders, 12A.06.155 Domestic violence prevention, 12A.06.160 Protection orders, 12A.06.165 Protection order-relief, 12A.06.170 Ex parte protection orders, 12A.06.175 Peace officer-assistance, 12A.06.180 Protection order-violation-contempt; and adding a new section to Chapter 12A.06 to clarify judicial proceedings on domestic violence cases to comply with state law.
